articles.description: Manchester United's point against Liverpool will calm the mood after a week of abject misery at Old Trafford, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Precious point will calm the mood for Man Utd'

articles.description: Harry Kane scores a double to become the quickest player to reach 20 Bundesliga goals as Bayern Munich beat fourth-placed Stuttgart.
articles.title: Kane hits 20th Bundesliga goal in record 14th game

articles.description: Jude Bellingham's first-half header gives Real Madrid the opening goal in their 4-1 win over Villarreal at the Bernabeu.
articles.title: Bellingham scores as Real beat Villarreal to go top

articles.description: After a final of thud and blunder, it fell to Rangers captain James Tavernier to come up with the one moment that mattered.
articles.title: Indomitable Tavernier drags Rangers to cup triumph

articles.description: How Australia spinner Nathan Lyon moved from groundsman to an unexpected Australian legend with 500 Test wickets to his name.
articles.title: 'He goes from Mr Bean to Thor' - Lyon's journey to 500 wickets

articles.description: Arsenal eventually see off a stubborn Brighton to move back above Liverpool - for a few hours at least - at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Arsenal edge past Brighton to go top of table

articles.description: Ian Wright tells Des Lynam that Match of the Day is his 'Graceland' as he makes his first appearance as a pundit on the programme alongside Sir Trevor Brooking back in 1997.
articles.title: 'This is my Graceland, Des!' - Wright's MOTD debut

articles.description: Harlequins concede seven tries in a 47-19 Investec Champions Cup thrashing by Toulouse at the Stoop.
articles.title: Harlequins thrashed at home by brilliant Toulouse

articles.description: Two red cards, 10 other players booked, both managers cautioned and silly scuffles - Brentford versus Aston Villa got out of control.
articles.title: 'We needed control, we lost a bit of our mind'

articles.description: As the Women's Super League pauses for the winter break, BBC Sport looks at the best stats so far with the title race and relegation battle set to the tightest yet.
articles.title: Longer games, more cards but same goals - WSL stats so far
